_comment: Repository configuration for D&A Agent Hub. All entries are cloned during setup.

da_obsidian.description: Data & Analytics team Obsidian knowledge management vault - raw notes and unrefined ideas

data_stack._comment: Organized data stack repositories by functional layer

orchestra.description: Primary orchestration system - kicks off and manages Prefect flow executions

prefect.description: Main Prefect flows repository (airbyte-orchestrator, dbt-jobs-orchestrator, business integrations: JDE/AD sync, RockTalk employee sync)

plantdemand_etl.description: PlantDemand ETL and Construction Forecasts flows (to PostgreSQL operational data store)

mapistry_etl.description: Mapistry ETL flows (to PostgreSQL operational data store)

xbe_data_ingestion.description: XBE data ingestion flows (to PostgreSQL operational data store)

postgres_pipelines.description: PostgreSQL data pipeline configurations (operational data store)

hex_pipelines.description: Hex platform data pipeline configurations (dlt-hub to Snowflake analytics data store)

streamlit_apps_snowflake.description: Streamlit applications for Snowflake data visualization

snowflake_notebooks.description: Snowflake notebook collection for data analysis

sherlock.description: Sherlock Investigation Bureau - data quality and pipeline issue investigation

prefect_context._comment: Prefect Cloud workspace context for workflow orchestration analysis

coordination_strategy.master_orchestration: orchestra-expert leads ALL workflow analysis - triggers everything
coordination_strategy.prefect_flows: Most Prefect flows are in the main 'prefect' repository (airbyte-orchestrator, dbt-jobs, business integrations)
coordination_strategy.specialized_flows: Construction/PlantDemand in plantdemand_etl, Mapistry in mapistry_etl, XBE in xbe_data_ingestion
coordination_strategy.dbt_coordination: orchestra-expert + dbt-expert for direct dbt job triggering
coordination_strategy.cross_tool_coordination: orchestra-expert coordinates all tools (Prefect, dbt, Airbyte, etc.)

orchestration_hierarchy.level_1_master: Orchestra (kicks off everything - Prefect, dbt, Airbyte, Snowflake jobs)
orchestration_hierarchy.level_2_executors: Prefect flows, dbt jobs, Airbyte syncs (when Orchestra calls them)
